Title: Literary License to Kill
Plot: Bette finds out that Jodi's been offered a job at an art center on the East Coast. Tasha's memories of the war continue to haunt her, and she is ordered to keep her sexual orientation a secret. Meanwhile, Shane plans a surprise for Paige, Helena is kicked out of the hotel, and Max comes to a decision regarding his job.
GuestStars: Bruce Davison,  Annabella Sciorra,  Clementine Shepherd-Ford,  David Lewis,  Grace Sherman,  Larry Kennar,  Crystal Balint,  Bruce Dawson,  Peter Hanlon,  Simone Bailly,  Jackson Allan,  Jon Wolfe Nelson,  Cybil
